**Summary**
• RFK Jr. claims COVID shots are still available to everyone, no restrictions.
• Cancer patients are getting fucked over while he spews his bullshit.
• Senators called him out for lying, and he just doubled down like a dumbass.

Impact — RFK Jr. is out here spreading misinformation while real people suffer.

────────────────────────────────
